Engineering Transfer Learning

Collection of transfer learning algorithms that have been generated or applied in engineering contexts, particularly for structural health monitoring, avaliable via Github.

Currently models include:

  • Transfer component analysis
  • Joint distribution adaptation
  • Balanced distribution adaptation
  • Metric-informed joint distribution adaptation
  • Kernelised Bayesian transfer learning
